locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Solicit reviews for objects of interest. Manage review objects and the review process.
Here you can install the default/predefined review objects types, if necessary update the installed ones or create your own review object types.
Please define all possible persons roles, that are important for this review object (e.g. Author, Contributor, etc). You won't be able to add and change them later.
This will also delete all existing objects for review of this type. Are you sure you wish to delete the review object type?
Update locale data for the above selected objects:
Install the missing review objects - choose the types and the locales and press the install button:
This will also delete all the same and existing objects for review metadata. Are you sure you wish to delete the metadata of the review object?
Checkboxes (you can choose one or more)
Radio buttons (you can only choose one)
Mode 1: List available objects for review, manage object reviewers, and publish object metadata.

Mode 1

The following workflow is supported:

  • Editor adds objects available for review.
  • Authors interested in reviewing an object can request to write a review, notifying the Editor.
  • Editor can accept or deny the review request, notifying the Author.
  • For the accepted review request a due date is set for the review.
  • The Editor can mail a copy of the object to the Author. The due date for the review is set anew.
  • Author submits review via the standard online submission process.
  • Object metadata is published as part of the object review submission.

This plugin supports journals with multiple editors. When an Editor adds a new object for review, he or she becomes the primary editor and correspondence contact for the object.

Mode 2

The following workflow is supported:

  • Editor adds objects for review.
  • Editor matches submissions (reviews) to each object.
  • Object metadata is published as part of the object review submission.
Display object metadata on the article abstract pages.
Publish the list of all available objects for review using the navigation item "Objects For Review".
week(s) after the object has been assigned to the author.
day(s) before the review due date.
day(s) after the review due date.

Note: To activate these options, the site administrator must enable the scheduled_tasks option in the OJS configuration file. Additional server configuration may be required to support this functionality (which may not be possible on all servers), as indicated in the OJS documentation.
Additional information published along with the objects for review.
For the editor only. Not published as part of the book for review.
Are you sure you want to remove this author and clear this object's review history?
For the editor only. Not published as part of the book for review.
Choose an editor that is resopnsible for this object for review.
Define if the object is available for review.
This will entirely remove the object and its assignments. Are you sure you want to delete this object?

To request an object for review:

  • Register as an author with this journal.
  • Log in as an author.
  • Click on the request link that corresponds to the object of interest.
Please indicate if this submission is a review for any of the following objects assigned to you
Review object type deleted. Also the related objects for review and their assignments.
Object for review requested. Awaiting confirmation from the Editor.
Object for review and their assignments deleted.
Author assigned to object for review.
Author request denied. Object for review reset to initial state.
Object for review recorded as mailed to author.
Author removed. Object for review reset to initial state.
Submission assigned to object for review.
Object for review plugin settings saved.
A name is required for the review object type.
A name is required for the review object metadata.
A type is required for the review object metadata.
Please fill in the required fields.
Please choose the person role and fill either the first or the last name.
Please specify a valid number of days for the reminder email.
Please specify the number of weeks for when object reviews are due.
Please specify a valid number of weeks for when object reviews are due.
